parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: Component in which to modify the feature (see Remarks )

title: ICrossBreakFeatureData.AccessSelections
description: Allows access to the selections that define this cross break feature.
signature:
System.Boolean AccessSelections( 
   System.Object
TopDoc
,
   System.Object
Component
)

parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: Component in which to modify the feature (see Remarks )

returns: True if the selections are successfully accessed, false if not
remarks:
To modify a feature in a...
Then...
Part
TopDoc argument is the
IModelDoc2
for the part
Component argument is Nothing or null
Assembly
TopDoc is the IModelDoc2 object for the assembly
Component argument is the
IComponent2
object in which to modify the feature
This method puts the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature. You must use one of the following methods to restore the rollback state:
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
or
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
if you modified the feature
ICrossBreakFeatureData::ReleaseSelectionAccess
if you did not
